price: 9. Nkolo ya moniele mpe eloli, nzambe mosusu azali te ya kobondela na bosóló sé ye, zúa ye mobateli (wa bino)!
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
